TEXT.TITLE: SOUTHAM INC <STM.TO> 1ST QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Oper shr 32 cts vs 37 cts Oper net 18.9 mln vs 21.6 mln Revs 352.1 mln vs 323.0 mln Note: 1987 net excludes extraordinary gain of 2.8 mln dlrs or five cts shr from sale of surplus property. Reuter
